review: It's a great bit of kit, but it's somewhat limited.  However, what it does, it does really well.Easy to set up and very simple to use.  Looking forward to it being launched on the European market so that more apps are opened up to it.  Currently only Youtube and Netflix seem to work with it - but to be fair, I knew that whan I bought it.

review: The Chromecast proves to be a solid device for streaming content. It is easy to setup and stops you from messing around with the hard to control UI of your Smart TV. It also seems that streaming content from Google Services is more reliable. The browser mirroring function is still in beta but anything else just works fine. A good device, even if some of the advertised features (apps) do not work in Europe.
